'''[[Classes:Actor|Actor]]'''
{{c|native clearscope static Vector2 '''AngleToVector'''(double ''angle'', double ''length'' {{=}} 1)}}
== Usage == Converts the given angle into a 2D vector that points in the direction of the angle.
=== Parameters === *{{c|double '''angle'''}} :The direction the vector should point *{{c|double '''length'''}} :Default is 1. The magnitude of the vector
=== Return value === Returns a Vector2 pointing in the direction of the angle.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
